myblog.title: H4I McGill Blog
myblog.description: Welcome! This is the official blog of H4I McGill. Stay tuned to get the latest updates.

posts.title: Chapter Founded
posts.content: Our chapter was founded in Fall 2019. We are excited to bring the Hack4Impact community to McGill University...

posts.title: Developer Bootcamp Day 1
posts.content: Today was the first day of our Developer Bootcamp. We covered frontend development for web apps...

posts.title: Developer Bootcamp Day 2
posts.content: Today was the second day of our Developer Bootcamp. We covered backend development for web apps...
